resources.string:
Main purpose of this app is to easily calculate results, for example if you have a table of people and their sport results and you need quick calculation what their position is exam. in jumps : 
 Alice (first line) 3.98 m -> 2.
 Bob 4.35 m -> 1.
 Charlie 3.90 m -> 3.
 It is easier and faster than calculating it by yourself. 
 Please use this app only as calculator not and have the results stored elsewhere (in case of dead battery, sudden rain...) Thank You
